title: Ludwig Atlas Pro Pillar Clutch Snare Stand
description: A radical new approach to suspending snares and toms, the new Atlas Pro snare stand's retractable, detachable basket -the Pillar Clutch- is the mounting solution every pro drummer has been waiting for. he Pillar Clutch (Patent Pend.): A folding, removable snare basket mechanism designed for optimum performance, and strength with any drum. Accommodates 10" to 16" drums: Sliding basket grips expand and contract at all three points. Aerodyne Tilter: A gearless, dual-axis rotating positioning system that easily places the drum securely at any angle. Low-Contact basket grips: The Pillar's low-tension basket clutch holds drums securely without choking the bottom hoop for maximum resonance. Vice-Grip tube joint with integrated memory lock: Fully wrapped around the clamped tube, the new Atlas tube joint clamp delivers a rock-solid grip, with minimal stress to the support tubing. Tripod Memory lock: For repeatable setups Vibration Reducing Rubber Feet Nylon lined tubing: Eliminates stand noise and secure stability. 1.25/1" Tier Tubing: For solid stability and night-after-night durability.
